package.name: object_discovery
package.description: Object_discovery package. This package can segment multiple objects from a given point cloud / ROS Mesh. It has a ROS wrapper which provides services and publishes the result in ROS topics. More information about the original segmentation capabilities on: http://cs.stanford.edu/people/karpathy/discovery/
package.author: Andrej Karpathy, Stephen Miller, Li Fei-Fei
